org.solenopsis.keraiai.soap.port.session

Class AbstractSessionPortFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flossware.jcore.AbstractCommonBase
      • org.solenopsis.keraiai.soap.port.AbstractPortFactory

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionPortFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxiedSessionPortFactory, UnproxiedSessionPortFactory

    public abstract class AbstractSessionPortFactory
extends AbstractPortFactory
implements SessionPortFactory
    Abstract base class for session port factories.
    Author:
    Scot P. Floess

    • Method Detail

      • createSessionPort

        protected abstract <P> P createSessionPort(WebServiceTypeEnum webServiceType,
                      Service service,
                      Class<P> portType,
                      String name)
        Create a port that is named appropriately in its URL and has the session id in the SOAP header.
        Type Parameters:
        P - the type of web service port.
        Parameters:
        webServiceType - the type of web service.
        service - the web service that can be used to create a port.
        portType - the class of the port to create.
        name - the name that is used as part of the URL for the web service.
        Returns:
        a port that is named appropriately in its URL and has the session id in the SOAP header.
